title: Marudhanayagam Lyrics Marudhanayagam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
thaam thanna
thaam thanna thaanaa
thana thaam thanna
thaam thanna thaam thanna
thaanaa

Valarndhadhu pagaiyodu ninnu
Ingu thodanguthu thodanguthu
Sarithiram Onnu (2)

Matham Kondu Vandhadhu Saathi
Indrum Manushana Thurathuthu
manu monna needhi
sitham kalangudhu saami
idhu raththam veri kondu
aadura boomi.

muppuram ericha sivanae...
ingae eppuram ponaalum
erivathu ennae.

Saadhikkor samayam sonnaanae..
thakka samayathil kaakkum
orr saadhi solvaanaa.

idappaagam irundha nal aalai
kayavar idukaattu sooraakki
ulara vittaarae.

kanneeril nanaiyaatha boomi
yaarum kannil kaatta thagumo
adhai kaanum kaalam varumao

Matham Kondu Vandhadhu Saathi
Indrum Manushana Thurathuthu
manu monna needhi.

sitham kalangudhu saami..
idhu raththam veri kondu
aadura boomi.  (2)
